ErrorEvent.summary: The ErrorEvent interface represents events providing information related to errors in scripts or in files.

remarks.para:
-Using web workers, most likely objects to raise such an event.
-: event
-: event

ErrorEventColno.summary: The colno read-only property of the interface returns an integer containing the column number of the script file on which the error occurred.

ErrorEventError.summary: The error read-only property of the interface returns a JavaScript value, such as an {{jsxref("Error")}} or , representing the error associated with this event.

ErrorEventErrorEvent.summary: The ErrorEvent() constructor creates a new object.

ErrorEventFilename.summary: The filename read-only property of the interface returns a string containing the name of the script file in which the error occurred.

ErrorEventLineno.summary: The lineno read-only property of the interface returns an integer containing the line number of the script file on which the error occurred.

ErrorEventMessage.summary: The message read-only property of the interface returns a string containing a human-readable error message describing the problem.
